column1: Kata Robata////My favorite roll is the rising sun because
column2: well... who doesn't love truffle? Â All of their sushi is super fresh - from salmon to hamachi (yellowtail) & jalapeno
column4: to fatty tuna. My mouth is literally watering. They also have an amberjack sashimi that they serve w/ foie gras that is absolutely amazing. There are so many options
column6: I've never had anything bad there. Don't forget to get some A5 wagyu sashimi too! Best in town!
